frontMatter.title: Number triangle pattern
frontMatter.description: Write a program to print number triangle pattern

contentHtml:
Write a program to print number triangle pattern.

Input  : 5
Output :
    1
   121
  12321
 1234321
123454321
markdown:
## Write a program to print number triangle pattern.

```txt
Input  : 5
Output :
    1
   121
  12321
 1234321
123454321
```

---
